text:
Hi guys,
I wonder if using these words in classes names is a MUST use convention while creating a HubSpot theme, especially in blog-post html pages:
`__post, __post-content, __post-content__title`
Is there any chance for a HubSpot blog that might not contain these words in their theme?
Thanks.

developers can use any class names they want, period. There are some commonly followed conventions that you’d see in our boilerplate. Separately the dnd editor itself adds certain classes, which you can view in the boilerplate’s grid css. Those would be the only ones that are likely to always be used.
